aws_cognito_identity_pool.description: Provides an AWS Cognito Identity Pool.

allow_unauthenticated_identities.description: - Whether the identity pool supports unauthenticated logins or not.

developer_provider_name.description: - The "domain" by which Cognito will refer to your users. This name acts as a placeholder that allows your

cognito_identity_providers.description: - An array of [Amazon Cognito Identity user pools](#cognito-identity-providers

openid_connect_provider_arns.description: - A list of OpendID Connect provider ARNs.

saml_provider_arns.description: - An array of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs

supported_login_providers.description: - Key-Value pairs mapping provider names to provider app IDs.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Identity Pool.

id.description: An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

arn.description: The ARN of the identity pool.
